title: In no circumstances shall one roomed tenements be allowed to be constructed or used as residence
clause_text: In no circumstances shall one roomed tenements be allowed to be constructed or used as residence. No chawls or temporary sheds shall be allowed to be constructed. Every building shall have a plinth of at least 2 feet above the general level of the ground. No building shall exceed 100 feet in length in any direction.
section: Special Building Rules framed by the Collector of Pune for this area shall be applicable which are as given below -

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
